data.name: Spermination: Cream of the Crop
data.detailed_description:
Spermination: perilously racing for a loaded Sperm Bank and gestating Bundles of Joy!

Choose from 3 different racing leagues, each with more risks, but higher rewards

Skillfully fly near walls or kill to reduce your Threat Level and survive longer

Prepare Your Load with weapons, afterburners, shields and more

Balance control, speed, energy use and damage output, as long as you can afford it!

VR is supported, but not required. Uses OpenXR (using SteamVR as your OpenXR runtime)
data.about_the_game:
Spermination: perilously racing for a loaded Sperm Bank and gestating Bundles of Joy!

Choose from 3 different racing leagues, each with more risks, but higher rewards

Skillfully fly near walls or kill to reduce your Threat Level and survive longer

Prepare Your Load with weapons, afterburners, shields and more

Balance control, speed, energy use and damage output, as long as you can afford it!

VR is supported, but not required. Uses OpenXR (using SteamVR as your OpenXR runtime)
data.short_description: You may have beaten off others and came first a thousand times, but you've never tasted the sweet Cream of the Crop. This sequel is harder, faster and will blow your crusty socks off! Choose from 3 difficult leagues: Hand, Mouth and the coveted Cream Pie! Crack the egg & unlock your bundle of joy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Quad core+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible 3D accelerated
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Beep boop
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590+ / AMD FX 8350+ for VR
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 (or equivalent) for VR

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Recent distributions should work
  • Processor: Quad Core+
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible 3D accelerated
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Beep Boop
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Spermination has silly adult and sexual references, but no nudity, sex or graphic imagery.
